org.workflowsim.failure
Class FailureRecord

java.lang.Object
  org.workflowsim.failure.FailureRecord

public class FailureRecord
extends java.lang.Object

Failure Record is a record with all information of a failure

Since:
WorkflowSim Toolkit 1.0
